CheckTitle: Ensure RAM users receive permissions through groups
Description: Ensures that RAM users receive permissions only through group membership, not through directly attached policies. Using groups makes permission management easier and more consistent across users with similar roles.
Risk: Directly attaching policies to individual users makes permission management difficult and increases the risk of misconfiguration or inconsistent permissions across users with similar roles.

Recommendation.Text: Remove directly attached policies from RAM users and add users to appropriate groups instead. Create groups with the required policies and add users to these groups.
